statements: SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT accommodation, activity FROM recommendations WHERE location = 'Beach';
SELECT id, location, accommodation, activity FROM recommendations ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE location LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, location, accommodation, activity FROM recommendations WHERE activity = 'Hiking' AND location IN ('Mountains', 'Forest');
SELECT id, location, accommodation, activity FROM recommendations WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE accommodation LIKE '%hotel%' ORDER BY accommodation DESC;
SELECT id, location, accommodation, activity FROM recommendations WHERE location = 'Paris' AND accommodation = 'Apartment' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, location, accommodation, activity FROM recommendations WHERE accommodation IN ('Hotel', 'Resort') ORDER BY location ASC, accommodation ASC;
SELECT id, location, accommodation, activity FROM recommendations WHERE location LIKE '%California%' AND activity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM solo_bnb_recommendations WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY accommodation_name ASC
SELECT accommodation_name, location FROM solo_bnb_recommendations WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT recommendation_id, accommodation_name, rating FROM solo_bnb_recommendations WHERE rating < 3.0 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT accommodation_name, rating FROM solo_bnb_recommendations WHERE rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_activities WHERE duration_hours > 2 ORDER BY category
SELECT * FROM solo_bnb_recommendations WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT accommodation_name, location FROM solo_bnb_recommendations WHERE location = 'Paris' ORDER BY accommodation_name;
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_activities WHERE duration_hours BETWEEN 2 AND 4 AND category = 'Outdoor' ORDER BY activity_id ASC;
SELECT accommodation_name, location, rating FROM solo_bnb_recommendations WHERE rating < 3.0;
SELECT activity_name, duration_hours FROM solo_travel_activities WHERE category = 'Cultural' ORDER BY duration_hours DESC, activity_name;
SELECT * FROM accommodation_recommendations;
SELECT accommodation_name, location, rating FROM accommodation_recommendations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM activity_recommendations WHERE recommended_age_group = 'Family';
SELECT traveler_name, age, country FROM traveler_details WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM accommodation_recommendations WHERE location = 'Beach' ORDER BY accommodation_name ASC;
SELECT accommodation_name, location, rating FROM accommodation_recommendations
SELECT * FROM accommodation_recommendations ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT activity_name, location, recommended_age_group FROM activity_recommendations WHERE rating > 4.5
SELECT traveler_name, country, age FROM traveler_details WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT activity_name, location, rating FROM activity_recommendations WHERE recommended_age_group = 'Family'
SELECT * FROM Accommodations;
SELECT accom_name, rating FROM Accommodations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT accom_name, location FROM Accommodations WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT rec_id, rating, cost FROM Recommendations WHERE cost < 500.00;
SELECT traveler_name, age FROM Travelers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM Accommodations
SELECT accom_name, location FROM Accommodations WHERE rating > 4
SELECT * FROM Activities WHERE duration BETWEEN 2 AND 4
SELECT a.accom_name, a.location, r.rating FROM Recommendations r JOIN Accommodations a ON r.accom_id = a.accom_id
SELECT t.traveler_name, t.age, ra.rating, ra.cost FROM Travelers t JOIN Recommendations ra ON t.traveler_id = ra.rec_id
SELECT * FROM accommodations;
SELECT name, location, price FROM accommodations ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT description FROM accommodations WHERE location='Paris';
SELECT name, category FROM activities WHERE category='Outdoor';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE price > 200 ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT accommodations.name, accommodations.location, activities.name as activity_name FROM accommodations JOIN recommendations ON accommodations.id = recommendations.accommodation_id JOIN activities ON activities.id = recommendations.activity_id;

SELECT users.username, accommodations.name, COUNT(recommendations.id) as total_recommendations FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.id = recommendations.user_id JOIN accommodations ON accommodations.id = recommendations.accommodation_id GROUP BY users.username, accommodations.name;

SELECT accommodations.name, AVG(ratings.rating) as average_rating FROM accommodations JOIN recommendations ON accommodations.id = recommendations.accommodation_id JOIN ratings ON recommendations.id = ratings.recommendation_id GROUP BY accommodations.name HAVING AVG(ratings.rating) > 4;

SELECT activities.name, recommendations.rating, recommendations.user_id, users.email FROM activities JOIN recommendations ON activities.id = recommendations.activity_id JOIN users ON recommendations.user_id = users.id WHERE recommendations.rating >= 3;
